LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailSimple.label: make simple cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailSimple.description: Make a simple cocktail quickly mixed from a duo of ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailFine.label: make fine cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailFine.description: Make a fine cocktail, mixed precisely from multiple ingredients.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailLavish.label: make lavish cocktail
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCocktailLavish.description: Make a lavish cocktail, mixed from a wide variety of ingredients and chilled to perfection before meticulously shaken and served.
